ygData.msgSnippet: Scourge was delighted... it had been years since he was truly able to be a true decepticon. He hugged her happily. Yessss i can see it now, I ll rebuild from

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 
 Scourge was delighted... it had been years since he was truly able to be a 
true decepticon. He hugged her happily. "Yessss i can see it now, I'll 
rebuild from here with these autobots and who ever i force into my army i 
will recreate my future now..." He looked into her eyes. "We will make 
megatrons day of wakening a grande one. where he will awaken to his dream 
come true!"  
   
Her form stiffened as her hugged & held her. Cocking a brow slightly. She was 
not truly used to this. Emotions was to her something she didn't want to 
feel, though.. she did feel them, which scared her. 
The other, what what did Scourge have in mind? He started to sound like 
another she knew many years ago, a clone of Megatron. Her heart ached with 
his absense. 
The final was him gazing at her. She looked back at him with a strange 
curiousity as to why he was hugging her... not showing her annoyance in ... 
flow of emotions. Her form she assumed was giving the sensation that she 
was... well, uncomfy.. somewhat.  
 Despite over the years, such emotions were still difficult for her. she she 
always tried to push them aside. It was not productive. At least not to her.  

 
 Scourge Looked at her and smiled. His CPU was on fire all of a sudden.  

She could barely look at him. She was nervous, nearly frightened. Or was she? 
She didn't know. Emotions were not something she delt with. 
She could only glance away from Scourge, glancing off to nothing, .. well.. 
sort of.. she was gazing off in the direction of the fusion cannon. No.. she 
didn't plan to harm anyone.. just... 
Her feathered mane just cascaded down her metallic back..  Her metallic wings 
flexed just briefly. She found it difficult to change the subject, when her 
meta processor could only think of her beloved leader...  

 Scourge sat her down and stepped back... He looked down then back at her. "I 
just thought of something..." 

  She sat down as he motioned her to do. 
Cocking a brow, as her arms draped over the armrests, "Oh? & dare I ask?" Her 
voice calm, as she gazed at him without emotions.  

 "I rushed into planning just as Megatron would do.... I just realized if 
Megatron becoes galvatron so this future/past can occur... Then i'll.." He 
stood and turned around. "I'll protect the ark as i promised..." 
 
 "Really now?" Not really charmed or excited with his statement.  

 He turned back looking into her eyes. "If i allow all this to occur, i'll 
never exist." He turned back and headed towards the main doors... 
 
"We all have made promises, Scourge-"
Her optics grew a little larger. What was he going to do?
She jumped up & ran to him & grabbing his arm. "Where are you going? What are 
you planning to do?!" She growled at herself internally, darn those emotions! 
She reacted in a way that she usually never did.  

Scourge turned and looked at her. "If i must i'll die, if i must i'll let my 
future fade away, but if i ever see a chance, i'll take it, to save my 
future." He closed his eyes and turned away. 

She gazed at him. It hurt her, again darn emotions, but the fact that another 
'offspring' of Megatron must suffer. She had seen so much of that. 
"You have yet the future to lead, Scourge." Pausing as she stood there upon 
the bridge, somewhat like a ghost amoung the scattered shards of bots around 
her. The hope that he would not do anything foolish. She 'felt' a slight 
connection with Scourge. That piece of him which was once Megatron. First 
Hydras.. now Scourge. 

She watched him. Hiding that slight pang of emotions as he was torn. She was 
torn. Her own devotion to Megatron was becoming more & more over the years. 

 


--part1_187.1a090243.2bf9e539_boundary
